Hi, I’m Zhiwei Li. You can find a brief introduction here. The eight buttons on my site highlight what I’m most passionate about; I encourage you to explore them.

In particular, I’d like to draw your attention to my three papers on reversing myopia. You can easily find these featured essays using the “select” button on the home page.

Feel free to reach out if you’re interested! You can say hi to me on X, or Telegram, leave a comment, send me a direct message, or drop me an email.
